benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/payments - Trigger a payment using the account external key

covered: Valid payload and success paths: TC01–TC06 demonstrate 201 responses with valid PaymentTransaction payloads and various parameter combinations.
Input validation and error handling: TC07–TC11 cover account-not-found, missing required parameters, malformed bodies, missing headers, and invalid paymentMethodId (400/404).
Authorization and security: TC17 covers unauthorized access (401) and TC18 tests against malicious payloads.
Error/dependency scenarios: TC12–TC16 and TC24 cover gateway/dependency failures (402, 422, 502/503/504).
Boundary, regression, and performance tests: TC21–TC23 (boundary/missing fields), TC25–TC26 (regression), TC27–TC29 (performance under various loads), and TC30 (documentation).
gaps: Duplicate submission / idempotency handling is not tested.
No explicit 500 Internal Server Error scenario (server-side fault) test.
No rate-limiting / throttling tests under high load.
Limited coverage for 403 Forbidden scenarios beyond the 401 case.
recommendations: Add a duplicate submission/idempotency test to verify how repeated POSTs are handled.
Add a test simulating a 500 Internal Server Error to validate server fault handling.
Introduce rate-limiting tests to verify behavior under high request rates.
Add tests for caching headers in responses (ETag, Cache-Control).
Include additional authorization scenarios (403/role-based access) to complement the existing 401 test.
